sen.j: 丸太町通（まるたまちどおり）は京都市の主要な東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Marutamachi-dori Street is one of the major east-west running streets in Kyoto City.
Marutamachi-dori Street is one of the major east-west streets in Kyoto City.
Marutamachi-dori Street is one of the major east-west streets in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 全区間京都市道187号鹿ヶ谷嵐山線として、4車線の供用および歩道が整備されている。
sen.e: The street having a 4-lane road with pedestrian paths is operated as Shishigaya-Arashiyama-sen, Kyoto City Road 187 Go.
The street, comprising a four-lane road with pedestrian paths, is operated as Shishigaya-Arashiyama-sen, Kyoto City Road 187 Go.
The street, comprising a four-lane road with pedestrian paths, is operated as the Shishigadani-Arashiyama Line of Kyoto City Road 187.
sen.cmt: Shishigadani-Arashiyama Line of the Kyoto City Road 18７ としました。

sen.j: 朝・夕のラッシュ時には渋滞が頻繁に起こる。
sen.e: Traffic congestions are common during the morning and evening busy periods.
Traffic congestion is common during the morning and evening rush hours.
Traffic congestion is common during the morning and evening rush hours.

sen.j: 東は鹿ヶ谷通から西は右京区嵯峨釈迦堂大門町まで延びている。
sen.e: It extends from the Shishigadani-dori in the east to the Saga-shakado-daimoncho, Ukyo Ward in the west.
It extends from the Shishigadani-dori in the east to the Saga-shakado-daimoncho, Ukyo ward, in the west.
It extends from Shishigadani-dori Street in the east to the Saga-shakado-daimon-cho, Ukyo Ward, in the west.

sen.j: かつては、西端は中京区の西ノ京円町交差点までであったが、1966年に西ノ京円町から妙心寺前交差点まで西に延伸、1970年にはさらに右京区嵯峨釈迦堂大門町まで延伸した。
sen.e: Its west end, which was once Nishinokyo-Emmachi crossing, was extended to Nishinokyo-Emmachi crossing, in 1966, and further to Saga-shakado-daimoncho Crossing, Ukyo Ward in 1970.
Its west end, which was once Nishinokyo-Emmachi crossing, was extended to Nishinokyo-Emmachi crossing, in 1966, and further to Saga-shakado-daimoncho Crossing, Ukyo ward, in 1970.

Its west end, which was once Nishinokyo-Enmachi crossing in Nakagyo Ward, was extended from Nishinokyo-Enmachi to Myoshinji-mae crossing in 1966, and further to Saga-shakado-daimon-cho crossing, Ukyo Ward, in 1970.
sen.cmt: 地名を一部修正、中京区 追加

sen.j: おおむね、この延伸区間は新丸太町通とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: Most of these extended sections are called Shin-marutamachi-dori.
Most of these extended sections are called Shin-marutamachi-dori.
Most of these extended sections are referred to as Shin-marutamachi-dori Street (new Marutamachi-dori Street).

sen.j: 平安京の春日小路に当たる。
sen.e: The Marutamachi-dori corresponds to the Kasuga-koji of Heiankyo.
The Marutamachi-dori corresponds to the Kasuga-koji of Heiankyo.
The Marutamachi-dori Street corresponds to the Kasuga-koji Street of Heian-kyo.

sen.j: この通り沿いの西堀川に材木商が多いため、この名がついたと言われている。
sen.e: The name "Marutamachi" is said to come from lumber dealers whose establishments were around along this street.
The name "Marutamachi" is said to come from lumber dealers whose establishments were around and along this street.
The name of the street is said to come from the fact that many lumber dealers were located in Nishi-horikawa, which lies along this street.

sen.j: 京都御苑の南端を走る。
sen.e: It runs along the southern edge of Kyoto Gyoen.
It runs along the southern edge of Kyoto Gyoen.
It runs along the southern edge of Kyoto Gyoen National Park.
sen.cmt: Kyoto Gyoen National Park としました。

sen.j: 江戸時代の地図を見ると｢丸田町通｣と表記されていることもある。
sen.e: Some maps in the Edo era named it Marutamachi (丸田町通).
sen.cmt: 表記の記述なので、日本語も記載しておきました。
sen.e: Some maps in the Edo era referred to it as Marutamachi (丸田町通).
Some maps in the Edo period referred to it as Marutamachi-dori (丸田町通) (as compared to the present-day Marutamachi-dori (丸太町通)).
sen.cmt: 現在の漢字表記と比べて、という補足 (as compared to the present-day Marutamachi-dori (丸太町通)) を追加しました。

sen.j: 上側が東側、下側が西側。
sen.e: East is upper and south is lower.
East is upper, and south is lower.
East is upper, and west is lower.

sen.j: 左側が北側、右側が南側。
sen.e: North is left and south is right.
North is to the left, and south is to the right.
North is to the left, and south is to the right.

sen.j: 交差する道路の特記がないものは市町村道。
sen.e: Roads unless specified are operated by local municipalities.
Roads are operated by local municipalities unless otherwise specified.
Roads are operated by local municipalities unless otherwise specified.

sen.j: 2005年度（平成17年度道路交通センサスより）平日24時間交通量（台）
